item.title: You’ve chosen to be here, so quit whining
item.author: William Seez,
item.description: “I have so much work! I hate Imperial!” Heard this before? Mmm… I thought so - there is a lot of this Imperial hate around. The same university that everyone has chosen to attend also appears to be the root of all of their misfortunes and unhappiness. This viewpoint is flawed and …
